products.title: Nobis Softshade Gold Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nobis softshade gold day and night blind in cream/yellow. Made to measure from 40.55 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The nobis softshade gold day and night roller blind offers grey flexibility for light control in any living, work or sleep space. With a design featuring quality polyester and sheer voile panels, you can retain a sense of seclusion whilst allowing plenty of natural light into your home.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1871 fabric colour: gold material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Natura, Gold - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Natura, gold - vista blind when you combine modern design with the timeless elegance of natural patterning you can create something special. Natura gold introduces a finely detailed fabric that speaks to the effortless way shade and tone interplay in wood
products.productdescription: When you combine modern design with the timeless elegance of natural patterning you can create something special. Natura gold introduces a finely detailed fabric that speaks to the effortless way shade and tone interplay in wood. Perfect for the uplifting touch you have been looking for. It also serves as the ideal companion for the elegant and breezy nature of the voile which hangs exactly how you want it.Gold works in any room in the house, but why not allow it to combine with your wood or laminate flooring to create a synergy that will make your house a home? Magnolia walls or a gentle light blue partner with natura gold to give your decor a calming feel.
